text: Donau-Ries (Bavarian: Landkroas Doana-Rias, Swabian: Landchrais Donau-Ries, lit.'Danube-Ries') is a rural district in Swabia in southwest Bavaria, Germany. Neighbor districts are: Ansbach (district), Weißenburg-Gunzenhausen, Eichstätt (district), Neuburg-Schrobenhausen, Aichach-Friedberg, Augsburg (district), Dillingen (district) and in Baden-Württemberg: Heidenheim (district) and Ostalbkreis); Donauwörth is the capital of the Donau-Ries. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Municipalities #Donauwörth #Harburg #Monheim #Nördlingen #Oettingen in Bayern #Rain #Wemding #Alerheim #Amerdingen #Asbach-Bäumenheim #Auhausen #Buchdorf #Daiting #Deiningen #Ederheim #Ehingen am Ries #Forheim #Fremdingen #Fünfstetten #Genderkingen #Hainsfarth #Hohenaltheim #Holzheim #Huisheim #Kaisheim 19.
